attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dont you think it's about time the government of this country started looking after its own instead of giving millions of pounds away to foreign countries and millions every week to people  who have come into this country to sponge off the state when british people who have worked like myself and payed in taxes all of our working lives cannot claim a pittance.
I have recently been laid off work and I have been told that I am entitled to a grand sum of £12.99 per week to feed and clothe my wife and family and to pay all of my bills. I am not racist but am being driven to become one care of this government.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
